mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CARD ( CARD_NO, CARD_NAME, CARD_TYPE, CARD_BRAND, ANNUAL_FEE, ISSUEDTO, SERVICE, S_SERVICE, CARD_STATUS, CARD_URL, CARD_ISSUEDATE, CARD_DUEDATE, CARD_SLOGAN, CARD_NOTICE, REG_DATE, EDIT_DATE ) VALUES ( CARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cardName}, #{cardType}, #{cardBrand},
#{annualFee}, #{issuedTo}, #{service}, #{sService}, #{cardStatus}, #{cardUrl}, #{cardIssueDate}, #{cardDueDate}, #{cardSlogan}, #{cardNotice}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
